text: Ray Kolle (born 1941) is an Australian screenwriter best known for his work in television. He was head writer on Neighbours for a number of years.Interview with Ray Kolle from 2003 accessed 10 July 2015 ==Selected filmography== *In Melbourne Tonight *Bellbird *The Box (TV series)'' *Prisoner *Neighbours *Home and Away *Headland ==References== ==External links== * *Personal website Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Australian television writers Category:Place of birth missing (living people)
title: Ray Kolle
